docs.title: About Me
docs.text:
Hi, I'm Rama — a tech enthusiast passionate about system administration, scripting, server automation, and open-source technologies.

I created this blog to document my learning journey and help others through practical notes and tutorials.

Thanks for dropping by!

Hai! My name is Rama. I am a technology enthusiast who loves sharing knowledge, notes, and personal experiences, especially around IT, Linux, programming, and the latest tech trends.

I created this blog as a space to document my learning journey, share tips, tutorials, and inspire others who share similar interests.

docs.title: Purpose of this blog
docs.text:
1. Sharing Knowledge Providing notes, guides, and tutorials based on personal experiences in an easy-to-follow.

  2. Learn Continuously Writing helps me deepen my understanding and share new insights along the way.

  3. Building Portofolio Creating a simple portofolio that tracks my growth and achievements in the IT world.

  4. Help other people I hope these notes can be useful references for anyone searching for solutions.

THank you for visiting. Feel free to read, learn, and discuss!
